entry.name: Hit 1: Radius
entry.description: Radius of sphere/capsule hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 2: Radius
entry.description: Radius of sphere/capsule hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 3: Radius
entry.description: Radius of sphere/capsule hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 4: Radius
entry.description: Radius of sphere/capsule hitbox.

entry.name: Knockback Distance
entry.description: Knockback distance of attack.

entry.name: Hit Stop Time
entry.description: Duration of the 'hit' flag on the target.

entry.name: Target Effect 1
entry.description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Target Effect 2
entry.description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Target Effect 3
entry.description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Target Effect 4
entry.description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Target Effect 5
entry.description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Hitbox Start Model Point: 1
entry.description: Model point at origin of hitbox. If Hitbox End Model Point is not -1, the hitbox will be a capsule with hemispherical caps positioned at these origins (with a joining cylinder).

entry.name: Hitbox Start Model Point: 2
entry.description: Model point at origin of hitbox. If Hitbox End Model Point is not -1, the hitbox will be a capsule with hemispherical caps positioned at these origins (with a joining cylinder).

entry.name: Hitbox Start Model Point: 3
entry.description: Model point at origin of hitbox. If Hitbox End Model Point is not -1, the hitbox will be a capsule with hemispherical caps positioned at these origins (with a joining cylinder).

entry.name: Hitbox Start Model Point: 4
entry.description: Model point at origin of hitbox. If Hitbox End Model Point is not -1, the hitbox will be a capsule with hemispherical caps positioned at these origins (with a joining cylinder).

entry.name: Hitbox End Model Point: 1
entry.description: Model point at end of capsule hitbox. If this is -1, the hitbox will be a sphere placed at Hitbox Start Model Point.

entry.name: Hitbox End Model Point: 2
entry.description: Model point at end of capsule hitbox. If this is -1, the hitbox will be a sphere placed at Hitbox Start Model Point.

entry.name: Hitbox End Model Point: 3
entry.description: Model point at end of capsule hitbox. If this is -1, the hitbox will be a sphere placed at Hitbox Start Model Point.

entry.name: Hitbox End Model Point: 4
entry.description: Model point at end of capsule hitbox. If this is -1, the hitbox will be a sphere placed at Hitbox Start Model Point.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Physical
entry.description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate physical attack damage.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Magic
entry.description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate magic attack damage.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Fire
entry.description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate fire attack damage.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Lightning
entry.description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate lightning attack damage.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Stamina
entry.description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate stamina attack damage.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Guard Attack Rate
entry.description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character guard attack power.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Guard Break
entry.description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character guard breaking power.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Throw Escape
entry.description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to weapon attacks during throws.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Poise
entry.description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to damage to target poise.

entry.name: Damage: Physical
entry.description: Absolute physical attack power of attack.

entry.name: Damage: Magic
entry.description: Absolute magic attack power of attack.

entry.name: Damage: Fire
entry.description: Absolute fire attack power of attack.

entry.name: Damage: Lightning
entry.description: Absolute lightning attack power of attack.

entry.name: Damage: Stamina
entry.description: Absolute stamina attack power of attack.

entry.name: Damage: Guard Attack Rate
entry.description: Absolute guard attack power of attack.

entry.name: Damage: Guard Break Rate
entry.description: Absolute guard breaking power of attack.

entry.name: Damage: Poise
entry.description: Absolute poise attack power of attack.

entry.name: Damage: Throw Escape
entry.description: Absolute attack power of attack during throw.

entry.name: Damage: Object
entry.description: Amount of damage dealt to objects by this attack.

entry.name: Guard Cut Stamina Rate
entry.description: Correction applied to the stamina required to block this attack.

entry.name: Guard Rate
entry.description: Percentage correction made to the guarding ability of the attack, as set in weapon parameters or NPC parameters.

entry.name: Throw Type ID
entry.description: Throw to trigger when attack hits. For some reason, throws are triggered using this ID, which is a field within each Throw table entry rather than the ID of the Throw table entry itself.

entry.name: Hit 1: Hit Type
entry.description: Type of hit applied by hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 2: Hit Type
entry.description: Type of hit applied by hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 3: Hit Type
entry.description: Type of hit applied by hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 4: Hit Type
entry.description: Type of hit applied by hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 1: Priority
entry.description: Priority of hitbox. If two hits occur simultaneously, only the highest priority hit occurs.

entry.name: Hit 2: Priority
entry.description: Priority of hitbox. If two hits occur simultaneously, only the highest priority hit occurs.

entry.name: Hit 3: Priority
entry.description: Priority of hitbox. If two hits occur simultaneously, only the highest priority hit occurs.

entry.name: Hit 4: Priority
entry.description: Priority of hitbox. If two hits occur simultaneously, only the highest priority hit occurs.

entry.name: Damage Level
entry.description: Impact level of attack, which determines how the target reacts to it (e.g. knocked backward, launched into the air, etc.). Certain special effects on the target (e.g. Iron Flesh) may re-map this impact level to a different one.

entry.name: Map Hit Type
entry.description: Determines how this attack interacts with the map.

entry.name: Guard Absorption Bypass Rate
entry.description: Percentage (from -100 to 100) of target's current guard rate to ignore. A value of -100 will ignore guarding completely, and a value of 100 will double their guarding effectiveness.

entry.name: Attack Attribute
entry.description: Type of physical damage done by attack.

entry.name: Effect Attribute
entry.description: Type of elemental damage done by attack.

entry.name: Attack Type
entry.description: Determines the sounds and visual effects generated by the attack itself (before hit).

entry.name: Attack Material
entry.description: Determines the sounds and visual effects generated when the attack hits. A value of 255 uses the weapon default.

entry.name: Attack Size
entry.description: Size of sounds and visual effects.

entry.name: Defence Material
entry.description: Determines the sound effects used when guarding. Usually 255 for Player Attacks and 0 (if not a block) or 50 (if blocking) for Non-Player Attacks.

entry.name: Defence FX Material
entry.description: Determines the visual effects used when guarding. Usually 255 for Player Attacks and 0 (if not a block) or 50 (if blocking) for Non-Player Attacks.

entry.name: Hit Source Type
entry.description: Specify where you get the model point for attack. Set to 1 for parries, ripostes, and basic body attacks (falling, rolling, etc.), and zero otherwise. Use that pattern.

entry.name: Throw Flag
entry.description: Determines how this attack relates to throws: not at all, a throw trigger, or a throw damage parameter.

entry.name: Disable Guard
entry.description: If True, this attack cannot be blocked (e.g. throws).

entry.name: Disable Stamina Attack
entry.description: If True, this attack will deal no stamina damage, regardless of its stamina attack power.

entry.name: Disable Hit SpEffect
entry.description: If True, this attack will trigger no special effects on the target.

entry.name: Disable Missed Attack Notification For AI
entry.description: If True, the character's AI will not be informed when this attack misses. Enabled for basic body attacks (falling, rolling, ladder punches, etc.) that are generally not considered to be serious attacks.

entry.name: Repeat Hit Sound FX
entry.description: If True, sound effects will supposedly be repeated as long as the attack continuously hits a wall.

entry.name: Is Physical Projectile
entry.description: Flags if this is the attack damage parameter of a physical projectile (arrow, bolt, or throwing knife).

entry.name: Is Attack By Ghost
entry.description: Flags if this is an attack of a ghost, which presumably disables wall collision, etc.

entry.name: Ignore Invincibility Frames
entry.description: If True, this attack will ignore invincibility frames from rolling or backstepping (but not other sources of invincibility such as TAE or events).
